GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.37 to before v4.14.296
GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix leak of nilfs_root in case of writer thread creation failure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.296 by commit a832de79d82ac8c9f445f99069e11b17c5d2224a, it was introduced in version v2.6.37 by commit e912a5b66837ee89fb025e67b5efeaa11930c2ce. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: nilfs2: fix leak of nilfs_root in case of writer thread creation failure
